scenario_text.value: Something really is watching us, Takuma.

You think it’s the thing that grabbed Aoi?
Where is it?!
Hmm... I’m not sure. It could be anywhere...

Man, this is creepy. Are we gonna get taken
just like she did...?
No way! I’ll definitely protect you!
Yeah... I’m depending on you, Agumon.
I won’t let anything snatch you up, Takuma!
